title: Add indexOf, rowCount and columnCount StreamEvaluators
description:
This ticket adds three Stream Evaluators:

indexOf : Returns the index of a value in an array.

rowCount: Returns the number of rows in a matrix

columnCount: Returns the number of columns in a matrix
